subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In an eight-player deal that was announced after 1 a.m. Eastern, Minnesota sent O.J. Mayo’s rights to Memphis in exchange for Mike Miller and the draft rights to forward Kevin Love.
snippet: In an eight-player deal that was announced after 1 a.m. Eastern, Minnesota sent O.J. Mayo’s rights to Memphis in exchange for Mike Miller and the draft rights to forward Kevin Love.
